title: Moelis and Deloitte in CSG Limited takeover
text:
Moelis and Deloitte have helped stitch up a $181.6 million takeover of IT services company CSG Limited.

Fuji Xerox offered 31¢ per share, in a deal valuing the company's equity at $140.8 million and $181.6 million on an enterprise value basis.

CSG Limited provides IT services and technologies in Australia and New Zealand. E+

The bid was at a 35.4 per cent premium to the one month volume weighted average price.

Moelis and MinterEllison advised CSG while Deloitte and Corrs were understood to have advised Fuji Xerox.

Caledonia Investments own a 29.67 per cent stake in the company. Other substantial shareholders on the register include Forager Funds Management, Microequities Asset Management, TDM Asset Management and Wentworth Williamson Management.
description: Moelis and Deloitte have helped stitch up a $181.6 million takeover of IT services company CSG limited.
